thread.title: This song was written by 36,000 people - and you can be one of them
thread.title_full: This song was written by 36,000 people - and you can be one of them

author: Madhumita Murgia
title: This song was written by 36,000 people - and you can be one of them
text: Internet This song was written by 36,000 people - and you can be one of them A new website named Crowdsound is experimenting with crowd-sourced songwriting and generating a melody using a voting system CrowdSound is crowdsourcing the melody of an original song, by asking users to vote on each note Photo: Getty
